code: @Manual{,   title = {standardcor: What the Package Does (Title Case)},   author = {Who wrote it},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://pricelab.github.io/standardcor/}, }

title: Sparse Spearman Correlation — SparsifiedRanks2
text: Replace non-zero entries sparse entries non-zero ranks

title: Sparse Spearman Correlation — SparsifiedRanks2
text: method creates rank matrix sparse matrix X using following approach: 1. Use non-zero enries column calculate ranks 2. Add (z-1)/2 ranks (non-zero entries changed). z number zeros column Since entries shifted constant (zeros already shifted), covariance matrix shifted matrix rank matrix entire matrix (zeros also rank = (z+1)/2) z number zeros rank matrix can used calculate pearson correlation (pearson correlation )  Copied without code changes, non-textual change comments, public blog repository  https://github.com/saketkc/blog/blob/main/2022-03-10/SparseSpearmanCorrelation2.ipynb owned Saket Choudhary Mumbai, India 23 Mar 2024

title: Estimate Beta parameters — estimateBetas
text: function estimates Beta parameters distribution given correlations.

title: Estimate Beta parameters — estimateBetas
code: estimateBetas(   corSet,   left = 0,   right = 0,   plot = FALSE,   fine = NULL,   trim = 0.01,   ... )

title: Estimate Beta parameters — estimateBetas
text: corSet Table correlation coefficients. left Left parameter Beta distribution. right Right parameter Beta distribution. plot TRUE, plot distribution shown. fine Number bins histogram. trim Proportion data trimmed.

title: Calculate Euclidean distance — euclidDistance
text: Calculates distance network correlation coefficient matrix using Euclidean function.

title: Calculate Euclidean distance — euclidDistance
text: mat matrix correlation coefficients v first parameter beta distribution w second parameter beta distribution type type distance calculate

title: Calculate power distance — powerDistance
text: Calculates distance network correlation coefficient matrix using power function.

title: Calculate power distance — powerDistance
text: mat matrix correlation coefficients k power raise distance type type distance calculate. Either "unsigned" "signed"

title: Calculate power distance — powerDistance
text: Correlation distance transformed follows: type = "unsigned"= 1 - abs(r)^k; type = "signed" = 1 - r)/2)^k

title: Calculate sigmoid distance — sigmoidDistance
text: Calculates distance network correlation coefficient matrix using sigmoid function.

title: Calculate sigmoid distance — sigmoidDistance
text: mat matrix correlation coefficients alpha alpha parameter sigmoid function tau0 tau0 parameter sigmoid function type type distance calculate
